name: Jean
title: Dandelion Knight
description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of stamina to launch an opponent using the power of wind.
charged.2: Launched opponents will slowly fall to the ground.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching opponents in the direction she aims at, dealing massive <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.
description.3: At the cost of continued stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding opponents and objects towards her front.
description.5: Character is immobile during skill duration.
description.7: That which follows Jean, the wholehearted defender, is a guardian wind that can banish danger from her comrades' presence.

description.0: Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding opponents and dealing <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.
description.1: At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for all party members. The amount of HP restored scales off Jean's ATK.
4: Continuously regenerates HP of characters within the AoE and continuously imbues them with <anemo>Anemo</anemo>.
Deals <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo> to opponents entering or exiting the Dandelion Field.
description.6: Jean's magnanimity is as vast as the dandelion fields, and it is the root of her wish to protect others.

description.0: On hit, Jean's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.
Using Dandelion Breeze will regenerate 20% of its Energy.
When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.
Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.
When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.
Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3.
Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.
Increases the Level of Gale Blade by 3.

constellation6.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt

description.0: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.
